solution_line_template: The amount of milk one cow gives in a week: {milk_per_cow_per_day} liters/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{milk_per_cow_per_day}*{days_per_week}={milk_per_cow_per_week}>>{milk_per_cow_per_week} liters/week

The amount of milk {num_cows} cows give in a week: {num_cows} cows * {milk_per_cow_per_week} liters/week/cow= <<{num_cows}*{milk_per_cow_per_week}={total_milk_per_week}>>{total_milk_per_week} liters/week
